long_description: The Giro Bravo fingerless bike gloves are designed for a wide range of riding, with an ergonomic design, generous gel padding and high-quality construction. Super Fit(TM) engineering process tailors gloves to match the shape and size of the hand, resulting in superior comfort and performance. AX Suede(TM) microfiber synthetic leather palms, fingers and thumbs are breathable, water resistant and abrasion resistant. 3-panel palm construction significantly minimizes bunching while enhancing bar grip and feel. Gel-padded palms absorb impact and increase comfort without compromising dexterity. Back of gloves features 4-way-stretch and moisture-wicking fabric for breathability. Giro Bravo bike gloves feature soft and highly absorbent fabric on the thumbs to give you a gentle place to wipe your nose and brow. Cuffs feature a rip-and-stick strap closures that hug wrists for a secure fit; sonic-welded pull tab ensures easy on/off.
